title: Implement Bootstrap Files Loader (internal/workspace/bootstrap.go)
description:

**Requirements:**
- Create BootstrapLoader struct that takes Workspace instance
- Implement LoadFile(filename) method to load individual bootstrap file

  - {{CURRENT_DATE}}
  - {{WORKSPACE_PATH}}
- Handle missing files gracefully (skip with warning log)
- Respect bootstrap_max_chars from config

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- All bootstrap files can be loaded individually
- Assembly respects priority order
- Template variables are properly substituted
- Missing files don't crash the loader
- Content is truncated if exceeds max_chars
- Unit tests cover all scenarios

**Files to create:**
- internal/workspace/bootstrap.go
- internal/workspace/bootstrap_test.go

title: Add template variable substitution to bootstrap content
description:
Implement template variable substitution for bootstrap files.

**Requirements:**
- Replace {{CURRENT_TIME}} with current time in format HH:MM:SS
- Replace {{CURRENT_DATE}} with current date in format YYYY-MM-DD
- Replace {{WORKSPACE_PATH}} with absolute workspace path
- Support for custom variables (future extensibility)
- Thread-safe for concurrent access

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- All template variables are substituted correctly
- Time/date reflect actual current values
- Workspace path is absolute and correct
- No template placeholders remain in output
- Tests verify substitution logic

**Files to modify:**
- internal/workspace/bootstrap.go (add SubstituteVariables method)

**Related tasks:** Part of bootstrap loader implementation
